channel.title: Contemporary Hotel on Gourmand Syndrome
channel.description: Recent content in Contemporary Hotel on Gourmand Syndrome

item.title: California Grill
item.description: The California Grill is located in the Contemporary Hotel right outside of Magic Kingdom. Supposedly, one of the most alluring features of this restaurant is not just its breathtaking view of the Magic Kingdom castle but also during the fireworks at night, when they pipe the music in and you can view it from afar. Unfortunately, there were no fireworks at night because of COVID, but that pushed us to give more attention toward the food.
